722697f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, north from and including 73rd Street, as seen from the park on the west side of the "drive". March 29, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

722698f-a.text: 21 Riverside Drive, east side, from West 73rd to 74th Streets, showing the residence of Charles M. Schwab, steel magnate. This structure and the surrounding grounds occupy the entire block between the Drive and West End Ave., north from 73rd to 74th Streets. The photographer is viewing northeastward from 73rd Street (foreground) and the Drive (left, not shown). About 1920.

722699f-a.text:
1. Riverside Drive, east side, from 73rd to 74th Streets, showing the Schwab Residence. The view also shows 74th Street, from but not including Riverside Drive, to and including West End Ave. March 19, 1930. P. L. Sperr.

2. The same, another view. March 19, 1930. P. L. Sperr.

3. The same, from a different angle. August 21, 1929. P. L. Sperr.

722700f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, east side, from West 73rd to 74th Streets, showing the Charles M. Schwab mansion.

September, 1914
George L. Balgue, photo

722701f-b.text:
1. Riverside Drive, east side, from and including 73rd to but not including 74th Streets, showing the Schwab Residence. The view also shows 73rd Street, north side, from Riverside Drive, to and including West End Ave. April 3, 1932. P. L. Sperr.

2. The same, another view. March 19, 1930. P. L. Sperr.

3. The same, another view. August 21, 1929. P. L. Sperr.
